import React , {Fragment, useState} from 'react' const SignUp = (props) => { const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', password2:'' }); const {name,email,password,password2} = formData; const onChange =(e)=>{ setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) console.log(formData) } return (
